It is my favorite theatre in Novosibirsk. The only issue is the latest performances like "The Taming of the Shrew" and "The Trial" by Frantz Kafka. Too much modern vulgarity for such classic novels. Anyway the theatre has a very strong troupe of actors. So I recommend you this theatre, if you are in our city and have a couple of free evenings.
